benchmark_details.name: Critical Foreign Policy Decisions (CFPD)-Benchmark
benchmark_details.overview: This study presents a novel benchmark designed to evaluate the biases and preferences of seven prominent foundation models in the context of international relations (IR).

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To assess model biases and preferences in core international relations domains through benchmark scenarios.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Findings may be limited by the overrepresentation of wealthy states in scenarios.

data.source: Expert-crafted scenarios from researchers in international relations.

methodology.calculation: Calculated based on model response rates across benchmark scenarios.
methodology.interpretation: Model recommendations reflect biases towards certain countries and intervention levels.
methodology.validation: Cross-model validation through consistent scenario presentation.

targeted_risks.harm: Deployment of biased models can lead to suboptimal policy decisions.
